prompt-and-type-conversion_key1: name: Agar hamein khud kuch btana ho code ko?
prompt-and-type-conversion_key2: Use prompt to take in two numbers and logging them in the console.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key3: Then use prompt to add two numbers. Here the student will realise that they cannot be added but are concatenated because they are `strings`.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key4: Talk about data types and then come to data type `conversion`.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key5: Come up with the complete example of taking `input` and then showing the `output` as the addition of numbers which were `input`.
prompt-and-type-conversion_key6: Add link to alert() & confirm() functions but do not explain about them.
